quote: Sisko to Dax.
scene: 1    INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS - ON DAX

quote: Yes, Captain.
scene: 1    INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS - ON DAX

quote: We arrive at Starbase Three-seven-   five in five minutes.
scene: 1    INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS - ON DAX

quote: I'll meet you in the Transporter    Room. Dax out.        Now, that is what I call really    bad timing.
scene: 1    INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS - ON DAX

quote: I'd better go.
scene: 1    INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS - ON DAX

quote: Jadzia, there is one more thing --
scene: 1    INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS - ON DAX

quote: As long as it's not about the    wedding.
scene: 1    INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS - ON DAX

quote: After we exchange vows, you must    remember to present your d'h tahg    to General Martok as a formal    request that he accept you into    his house.
scene: 1    INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS - ON DAX

quote: But I don't want to join his    house.
scene: 1    INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS - ON DAX

quote: What?
scene: 1    INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS - ON DAX

quote: I don't want to get caught up in    all those blood feuds. Every time    a member of the House of Martok    gets dishonored or killed, I'll    have to drop whatever I'm doing    and rush off on a quest for    vengeance. It's boring, Worf.
scene: 1    INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS - ON DAX

quote: If you refuse, it will be a grave    dishonor. Martok will never --
scene: 1    INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS - ON DAX

quote: Worf, I'm joking.
scene: 1    INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS - ON DAX

quote: Then you will join our house?
scene: 1    INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS - ON DAX

quote: of course I will.
scene: 1    INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS - ON DAX

quote: I can see that our lives together    will not be easy.
scene: 1    INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS - ON DAX

quote: True. But they will be fun.
scene: 1    INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS - ON DAX

quote: This is General Martok of the    I.K.S. Rotarran, requesting    permission to dock.
scene: 3    INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: General, you're cleared for    docking at Bay Eleven.
scene: 3    INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: Thank God.
scene: 3    INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: I never thought I'd miss Starfleet    field rations. Give me some    freeze-dried peaches, or powdered    carrots, anything, as long as it    isn't moving.
scene: 3    INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: I don't mind the food. It's the    singing...
scene: 3    INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: ... till all hours of the night.
scene: 3    INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: If I'd had to listen to one more    ballad about the honored dead, I'd    have gone stark raving mad.
scene: 3    INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: Captain Sisko, Admiral Ross    requests that you and your senior    staff beam to his conference room    for debriefing immediately.
scene: 3    INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: Tell the admiral we're on our way.        Once again, thank you for rescuing    us, general.
scene: 3    INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: Try not to get too comfortable    lounging around that starbase, we    need you back in the fight.
scene: 3    INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: Are you a betting man, General?
scene: 3    INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: One of my many pleasures.
scene: 3    INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: Then a barrel of bloodwine says    that I'll set foot on Deep Space    Nine before you do.
scene: 3    INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: Done!
scene: 3    INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: General, I've just received word.    The reinforcements from the    Vor'nak are here.
scene: 5    INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Good.
scene: 5    INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Look at this. Barely moving. I'd    give my good eye for a plate of    fresh gagh... How many    replacements?
scene: 5    INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Five.
scene: 5    INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Five? I requested fifteen.
scene: 5    INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: General Tanas could only send us    five.
scene: 5    INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: We keep falling back and the    Dominion keeps pushing forward.    I tell you, Worf, war is much more    fun when you're winning. Defeats    make my wounds ache.         Ah, the replacements.
scene: 5    INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: I am General Martok. Welcome to    the Rotarran! May you prove    worthy of this ship and bring    honor to her name.
scene: 5    INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: This is a glorious moment in the    history of the Empire, a chapter    that will be written with your    blood. Fight well, and our people    will sing your praises for a    thousand years. Fail, and there    will be no more songs, no more    honor, no more Empire. Who among    you hears the cry of the warrior    calling you to glory?
scene: 5    INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: K'plah!
scene: 5    INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Who offers their life for the    Empire?
scene: 5    INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: N'Garen, daughter of Tse'Dek!
scene: 5    INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Katogh, son of Ch'Pok!
scene: 5    INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Koth, son of Larna!
scene: 5    INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Doran, daughter of W'mar!
scene: 5    INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Alexander Rozhenko!
scene: 5    INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Alexander?
scene: 5    INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Rozhenko? Of what house is    Rozhenko?
scene: 5    INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Of no house, sir. My honor will    be my own.
scene: 5    INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Well, there will be much honor for    the taking on this ship -- enough    for all of you. I accept your    lives into my hands. Glory to    you, and to the Empire!
scene: 5    INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Yih-Ghom-HAH!
scene: 5    INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: This Alexander Rozhenko -- you    know him.
scene: 5    INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: He is my son.
scene: 5    INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: The next thing we need is a secure    way to communicate with our    contacts on Bajor.
scene: 10   INT. QUARK'S

quote: The Cardassians are extremely    adept at locating the source of    any illicit subspace transmission.
scene: 10   INT. QUARK'S

quote: Then we'll have to be smarter than    they are.
scene: 10   INT. QUARK'S

quote: Hi. Mind if I join you?
scene: 10   INT. QUARK'S

quote: You already have.
scene: 10   INT. QUARK'S

quote: I want in.
scene: 10   INT. QUARK'S

quote: In on what?
scene: 10   INT. QUARK'S

quote: Your resistance cell.
scene: 10   INT. QUARK'S

quote: What cell?
scene: 10   INT. QUARK'S

quote: Come on, major. I have my    sources.
scene: 10   INT. QUARK'S

quote: How reassuring.
scene: 10   INT. QUARK'S

quote: I can help.
scene: 10   INT. QUARK'S

quote: How?
scene: 10   INT. QUARK'S

quote: As a reporter I hear things.    People talk to me.
scene: 10   INT. QUARK'S

quote: About what?
scene: 10   INT. QUARK'S

quote: Major, all I'm asking for is a    chance.
scene: 10   INT. QUARK'S

quote: It's time, major.
scene: 10   INT. QUARK'S

quote: Already?
scene: 10   INT. QUARK'S

quote: Fourteen fifty-seven hours. The    shuttle will be docking in three    minutes.
scene: 10   INT. QUARK'S

quote: I better go. I wouldn't want to    keep him waiting.
scene: 10   INT. QUARK'S

quote: I see Gul Dukat's still having you    meet him every time he returns to    the station.       Like I said, I hear things.
scene: 10   INT. QUARK'S

quote: Shouldn't you be wearing your    dress uniform?        You look lovely just the way you    are.
scene: 10   INT. QUARK'S

quote: So, am I in or not?
scene: 10   INT. QUARK'S

quote: You don't want to get involved in    that, but, if you're looking for    something to do, I could use    another waiter...
scene: 10   INT. QUARK'S

quote: Major Kira, so good to see you    again.
scene: 12   INT. TEROK NOR - DOCKING RING CORRIDOR

quote: You're out of uniform, Major.    Bajorans could use a lesson in    respect.
scene: 12   INT. TEROK NOR - DOCKING RING CORRIDOR

quote: Damar, please. This is a happy    occasion. Let's not spoil it.
scene: 12   INT. TEROK NOR - DOCKING RING CORRIDOR

quote: I have a surprise for you.
scene: 12   INT. TEROK NOR - DOCKING RING CORRIDOR

quote: Nerys! I'm so glad to see you.
scene: 12   INT. TEROK NOR - DOCKING RING CORRIDOR

quote: Ziyal, what are you doing here?   You're supposed to be on Bajor.
scene: 12   INT. TEROK NOR - DOCKING RING CORRIDOR

quote: I talked her into taking a little   sabbatical from the university.
scene: 12   INT. TEROK NOR - DOCKING RING CORRIDOR

quote: You talked her into it?
scene: 12   INT. TEROK NOR - DOCKING RING CORRIDOR

quote: It didn't take much convincing.   Why don't you and I have dinner   tonight. I'll tell you all about   it.
scene: 12   INT. TEROK NOR - DOCKING RING CORRIDOR

quote: (hoping to clear things     up)   All right.
scene: 12   INT. TEROK NOR - DOCKING RING CORRIDOR

quote: Splendid! We'll dine in my   quarters at twenty-two hundred.
scene: 12   INT. TEROK NOR - DOCKING RING CORRIDOR

quote: Wait a minute? That's not what I --
scene: 12   INT. TEROK NOR - DOCKING RING CORRIDOR

quote: I can't tell you how much I've    missed you.
scene: 12   INT. TEROK NOR - DOCKING RING CORRIDOR

quote: Come along, Ziyal.
scene: 12   INT. TEROK NOR - DOCKING RING CORRIDOR

quote: See you tonight!
scene: 12   INT. TEROK NOR - DOCKING RING CORRIDOR

quote: You sent for me, general.
scene: 15   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM (VPB)

quote: Orders at last! We are to escort    a convoy to Donatu Five.
scene: 15   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM (VPB)

quote: The last three convoys sent there    were destroyed by the Jem'Hadar.
scene: 15   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM (VPB)

quote: Which is why this one must get    through.
scene: 15   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM (VPB)

quote: How many ships will form the    escort?
scene: 15   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM (VPB)

quote: The Rotarran is all the High    Council can spare.        A vital mission, impossible odds    and a ruthless enemy. What more    could we ask for? I tell you    Worf, I feel young again.        Here is the briefing. Start    battle drills immediately. Train    them hard.
scene: 15   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM (VPB)

quote: By the time we join the convoy,    this crew will have the reflexes    of a Norpin Falcon.
scene: 15   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM (VPB)

quote: I expect nothing less.
scene: 15   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM (VPB)

quote: One moment, Worf.
scene: 15   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM (VPB)

quote: We have shed blood together,    escaped a Jem'Hadar prison    together. You have pledged    yourself and your life to my House --   yet in all this time, you have    never mentioned that you had a    son!
scene: 15   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM (VPB)

quote: It is a... difficult subject to    discuss.
scene: 15   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM (VPB)

quote: That much is obvious.
scene: 15   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM (VPB)

quote: (very uncomfortable   Alexander and I were never...    close. His mother was only half-   Klingon and disdainful of our    ways.
scene: 15   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM (VPB)

quote: I see. You allowed her to raise    the boy.
scene: 15   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM (VPB)

quote: No, General. She was killed...       ... when he was very young. He    spent a short time with me aboard    the Enterprise. After that, I    sent him to live with my foster    parents on Earth.
scene: 15   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM (VPB)

quote: Why?
scene: 15   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM (VPB)

quote: He -- showed no interest in    becoming a warrior. It was    difficult, but I learned to accept    it and, in time, I encouraged him    to follow his own path.
scene: 15   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM (VPB)

quote: Then why has he joined the Klingon    Defense Forces?
scene: 15   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM (VPB)

quote: I do not know. I have not spoken    with him.
scene: 15   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM (VPB)

quote: My friend, this is not good. When    a father and son do not speak, it    means there is trouble between    them.
scene: 15   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM (VPB)

quote: I prefer to handle this in my own    way.
scene: 15   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM (VPB)

quote: Then do so.
scene: 15   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM (VPB)

quote: Come in.
scene: 16   INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS

quote: Bekk  Alexander Rozhenko    reporting as ordered, sir.
scene: 16   INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS

quote: You have grown.
scene: 16   INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS

quote: So I'm told.
scene: 16   INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS

quote: How are your grandparents?
scene: 16   INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS

quote: Your parents were in good health    when I last saw them.
scene: 16   INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS

quote: Do they know you are here?
scene: 16   INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS

quote: They weren't happy about my    decision, but when they realized    I was determined to enlist, they    supported me as they always have.
scene: 16   INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS

quote: I know we have not seen each other    in some time. But let us talk as    father and son.
scene: 16   INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS

quote: I am not here to call you,    "Father." I am here to serve the    Empire.
scene: 16   INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS

quote: Serving the Empire was not one of    your priorities the last time we    spoke.
scene: 16   INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS

quote: As you say, that was some time    ago.
scene: 16   INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS

quote: Did you think enlisting would    please me?
scene: 16   INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS

quote: Pleasing you did not enter into my    decision. With all due respect,    does this conversation have any...       uh... bearing on my duties aboard    this ship?
scene: 16   INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS

quote: Stop pretending to be a warrior.    We both know you do not belong    here!
scene: 16   INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS

quote: You have heard what I expect from    the rest of the crew.
scene: 16   INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS

quote: I will expect twice that from you.    Do we understand each other?
scene: 16   INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS

quote: Perfectly.
scene: 16   INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS

quote: You may go.
scene: 16   INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS

quote: Come in.
scene: 20   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - AFTERNOON

quote: Nerys. You're early... I just    started the ramufta.
scene: 20   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - AFTERNOON

quote: Ziyal, I'm not having dinner with    you tonight.
scene: 20   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - AFTERNOON

quote: Oh.
scene: 20   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - AFTERNOON

quote: It's because of my father, isn't    it?
scene: 20   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - AFTERNOON

quote: That's right.
scene: 20   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - AFTERNOON

quote: I thought you might back out. I    was hoping I was wrong.
scene: 20   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - AFTERNOON

quote: Ziyal, what are you doing back on    the station?
scene: 20   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - AFTERNOON

quote: Please don't be upset with me. I    know how hard you worked to    arrange things for me on Bajor.    I tried, I really tried.
scene: 20   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - AFTERNOON

quote: I'm not upset with you, just a    little confused. Now tell me what    happened.
scene: 20   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - AFTERNOON

quote: It wasn't any one thing. The    students at the university,    everybody was... polite. But I'd    see them whispering in the    hallways and staring at me. I'm    the daughter of Gul Dukat. My    father is leading a war against    the Emissary of the Prophets.         I don't know what made me think I    could fit in.
scene: 20   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - AFTERNOON

quote: This station is the closest thing    to a home that I have. You're    here. And my father is here.
scene: 20   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - AFTERNOON

quote: And the last time you defied him,    he left you here to die.
scene: 20   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - AFTERNOON

quote: We talked about that. He admits    he overreacted, but family loyalty    is important to my father and he    felt I betrayed him.
scene: 20   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - AFTERNOON

quote: You betrayed him? I think it's    the other way around.
scene: 20   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - AFTERNOON

quote: He misses me, Nerys. And I've    missed him.
scene: 20   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - AFTERNOON

quote: I have to give him a chance. He's    all I have, except for you. I was    hoping you'd have dinner with us    tonight because there's something    special I wanted to share with    both of you.        But I guess that's impossible.
scene: 20   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - AFTERNOON

quote: All right, I'll be here. But I    can't guarantee it's going to be    much fun.
scene: 20   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - AFTERNOON

quote: I promise my father will behave.
scene: 20   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - AFTERNOON

quote: Is this seat taken?
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Alexander Rozhenko.       We were holding it just for you.
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: I am honored.
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: The honor is ours.
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Please.
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Bregit lung. An excellent choice.
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Would you care for some grapok   sauce?
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: No thank you.
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Oh, you must try some. It brings    out the flavor.
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: That's enough.
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Some bloodwine to wash it down?
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Why are you laughing?
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Or perhaps the son of our    illustrious first officer would    prefer an Earth beverage. A glass    of root beer, with a lump of "ice    cream?"
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Are you mocking me?
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Now why would I mock you, Son of    Worf?
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: I am called Rozhenko.
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: I will call you whatever I please.    And you will learn to like it.
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Does the son of Starfleet's finest    think he is too good to eat with    us?
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: No. Have some lung.
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: I do not like your smile. Perhaps    I will cut you a new one.
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: He fights like a Ferengi.
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Shakk-TAH!
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Your combat training has been   sadly neglected, little one.    (flips the knife in his    hand)   I will teach you a new lesson...   one you will not soon forget.
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Enough!
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: You had no right to interfere.
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: You will both report to the    medical ward immediately. After    they have finished with you, you    will remain in quarters until your    next watch.
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: The rest of you, back to your    stations, now!
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Are you going to fight the    Jem'Hadar for him as well?
scene: 22   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL

quote: Vedek Nane taught me to focus    intently on the image I wanted to    evoke; to allow it to fully form    in my mind before I even picked up    the brush.
scene: 38   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - NIGHT - CLOSE ON DRAWING

quote: Well, what do you think?
scene: 38   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - NIGHT - CLOSE ON DRAWING

quote: They're... very good.
scene: 38   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - NIGHT - CLOSE ON DRAWING

quote: You think so?
scene: 38   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - NIGHT - CLOSE ON DRAWING

quote: It reminds me of Vedek Topek's    early work.
scene: 38   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - NIGHT - CLOSE ON DRAWING

quote: How ironic. I was about to say    that they're similar to the style    of Nanpart Malor, the founder of    the Valonnan school on Cardassia.
scene: 38   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - NIGHT - CLOSE ON DRAWING

quote: The director of the Cardassian    Institute of Art said the same    thing.
scene: 38   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - NIGHT - CLOSE ON DRAWING

quote: You spoke with the director?
scene: 38   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - NIGHT - CLOSE ON DRAWING

quote: I sent him some of my drawings.
scene: 38   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - NIGHT - CLOSE ON DRAWING

quote: You should have told me. I could    have arranged for you to see him    in person.
scene: 38   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - NIGHT - CLOSE ON DRAWING

quote: I know, but I wanted to do this on    my own. He said I have a real    gift. The Institute is having an    exhibition of new artists next    month and he might want to include    my work.        It's a chance to show that both    Bajorans and Cardassians look at    the universe the same way. That's    what I want to do with my work:    Bring people together.
scene: 38   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - NIGHT - CLOSE ON DRAWING

quote: I guess it sounds a little silly.
scene: 38   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - NIGHT - CLOSE ON DRAWING

quote: On the contrary my dear, you're    quite eloquent.
scene: 38   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - NIGHT - CLOSE ON DRAWING

quote: Are you ready for dessert?
scene: 38   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - NIGHT - CLOSE ON DRAWING

quote: I'm not going anywhere.
scene: 38   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - NIGHT - CLOSE ON DRAWING

quote: I don't believe the change. I've    never seen her so...
scene: 38   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - NIGHT - CLOSE ON DRAWING

quote: Happy? Neither have I, Major.
scene: 38   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - NIGHT - CLOSE ON DRAWING

quote: She's finally found something, a    talent, a direction.
scene: 38   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - NIGHT - CLOSE ON DRAWING

quote: I'm reluctant to admit it, but you    were right to send her to Bajor.
scene: 38   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - NIGHT - CLOSE ON DRAWING

quote: I'm glad it worked out.
scene: 38   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - NIGHT - CLOSE ON DRAWING

quote: We seldom see eye-to-eye Major,    but I know you care about my    daughter, and for that I am    grateful.
scene: 38   INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS - NIGHT - CLOSE ON DRAWING

quote: The response times are much    better. Keep working them.        Sit.
scene: 40   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM

quote: Two more days until we reach the    Donatu System. We should be    hearing from the Jem'Hadar soon.
scene: 40   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM

quote: Yes.
scene: 40   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM

quote: There's only one thing I hate    about convoy duty. The waiting.    After all these years, you'd think    I'd be used to it.    (lifts his mug, admires     it)    But nothing is better for breaking    the tension than a tankard of    warnog... except maybe a good    brawl.
scene: 40   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM

quote: You heard about the fight in the    Mess Hall.
scene: 40   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM

quote: But not from my first officer. I    lost him the moment his son    stepped aboard this ship.
scene: 40   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM

quote: You think I acted improperly?
scene: 40   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM

quote: It is not easy to stand aside and    watch someone injure your son.
scene: 40   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM

quote: Alexander was no match for    Ch'Targh. He would have killed    the boy.
scene: 40   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM

quote: Ch'Targh might have cut him a    little, maybe broken a few bones,    but nothing more. You say    Alexander never wanted to become    a warrior. Clearly he has changed    his mind.        You are his first officer. Teach    him to survive. The Jem'Hadar    will not be as forgiving as    Ch'Targh.
scene: 40   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM

quote: Battle stations. Alert status    one. Captain to the bridge.
scene: 40   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM

quote: Report.
scene: 41   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Jem'Hadar attack ship, bearing one-   seven-zero mark zero-four-five.    Estimate weapons range in twenty-   two seconds.
scene: 41   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: On screen.
scene: 41   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Where is it?
scene: 41   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: I have no target on my sensors.    Switching to manual.
scene: 41   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Reroute primary sensors to weapons    control.
scene: 41   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Aye, sir.        The Jem'Hadar has launched two    torpedoes.
scene: 41   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: At us, or at the convoy?
scene: 41   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: At us, sir. Impact in ten    seconds.
scene: 41   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Drop cloak and raise shields.    Evasive action.
scene: 41   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Torpedoes still locked onto us.    They will hit in four seconds.    Three.
scene: 41   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Brace for impact.
scene: 41   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Two... one...
scene: 41   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Reinitialize primary sensors.
scene: 41   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Sensors reinitialized. The -- the    Jem'Hadar ship is gone!
scene: 41   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Of course it is gone. You forgot    to erase the battle simulation    program from the sensor display.
scene: 41   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Stand down from alert status.    Resume course. Reactivate cloak.
scene: 41   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Keep a close watch. There may be    more hostile simulation programs    out there.
scene: 41   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Wait.
scene: 41   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: He will never make that mistake    again. And it's better for us to    be too ready than not ready    enough.
scene: 41   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: At least you're keeping us on our    toes.
scene: 41   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: You see, they have accepted him.
scene: 41   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: They have accepted him as the    ship's fool.
scene: 41   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: ... In closing, let me emphasize    again that Cardassia's gift of    fifteen industrial replicators to    Bajor ushers in a new age of    understanding and cooperation    between our two peoples. Hand-in-   hand, we will march into a new era    of peace and prosperity as    Dominion allies.
scene: 45   INT. WARDROOM

quote: Thank you. That will be all.    Major Kira, may I have a word,    please?
scene: 45   INT. WARDROOM

quote: Have you heard? The Cardassian    Institute of Art has decided to    exhibit three of Ziyal's drawings.
scene: 45   INT. WARDROOM

quote: Really? That's wonderful. She    must be excited.
scene: 45   INT. WARDROOM

quote: I'm hosting a celebration for her    tonight in my quarters. I hope    you'll join us.
scene: 45   INT. WARDROOM

quote: What time?
scene: 45   INT. WARDROOM

quote: Twenty-one-thirty. Unless I'm    unavoidably delayed.
scene: 45   INT. WARDROOM

quote: The busy life of an interstellar    despot.
scene: 45   INT. WARDROOM

quote: I prefer the term, "tyrant."
scene: 45   INT. WARDROOM

quote: I was thinking of assigning Damar    to escort Ziyal to the opening.
scene: 45   INT. WARDROOM

quote: Damar? You can't be serious.
scene: 45   INT. WARDROOM

quote: He's a fine officer from a good    family.
scene: 45   INT. WARDROOM

quote: He's a self-righteous sycophant    who despises everything Bajoran.
scene: 45   INT. WARDROOM

quote: I assure you, Major, Damar doesn't   despise your people.
scene: 45   INT. WARDROOM

quote: Then why does his upper lip curl    every time he says the word    "Bajor?"    (imitates Damar,     complete with sneer)    "Bajorans could use a lesson in    respect."
scene: 45   INT. WARDROOM

quote: He does no such thing.
scene: 45   INT. WARDROOM

quote: Gul Dukat?
scene: 45   INT. WARDROOM

quote: Ah, Damar... impeccable timing, as    always.
scene: 45   INT. WARDROOM

quote: Sir, the Bajoran     delegation requests that the    replicators be shipped by Bajoran     transports.
scene: 45   INT. WARDROOM

quote: Thank you, Damar. That will be    all.
scene: 45   INT. WARDROOM

quote: You heard the major.
scene: 45   INT. WARDROOM

quote: Sir?
scene: 45   INT. WARDROOM

quote: (fighting to keep    control)   We'll continue this discussion at   another time.
scene: 45   INT. WARDROOM

quote: Very well.
scene: 45   INT. WARDROOM

quote: I believe I owe you an apology.    You and...       ... the Bajoran people.
scene: 45   INT. WARDROOM

quote: This is a kar'takin, a weapon    favored by the Jem'Hadar.        Defend yourself.
scene: 47   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM (REDRESS MESS)

quote: That is not the proper grip.     (reaches out to adjust     Alexander's hands)   Your thumbs must be opposed so   that twisting motions will not --
scene: 47   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM (REDRESS MESS)

quote: I understand.
scene: 47   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM (REDRESS MESS)

quote: Then proceed.
scene: 47   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM (REDRESS MESS)

quote: No! Don't try to shove my blade    away. Deflect it and use your    momentum to counter.
scene: 47   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM (REDRESS MESS)

quote: I know!
scene: 47   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM (REDRESS MESS)

quote: Then do it.
scene: 47   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM (REDRESS MESS)

quote: Don't try to fight force with    force. You will lose every time.
scene: 47   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM (REDRESS MESS)

quote: What did I tell you? Pick it up!
scene: 47   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM (REDRESS MESS)

quote: If you had kept practicing what I    taught you when you were a boy --
scene: 47   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM (REDRESS MESS)

quote: What is wrong with you?
scene: 47   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM (REDRESS MESS)

quote: I knew it would be like this.
scene: 47   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM (REDRESS MESS)

quote: Like what?
scene: 47   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM (REDRESS MESS)

quote: You must be pleased --
scene: 47   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM (REDRESS MESS)

quote: -- now you can tell me what a    failure I am as a Klingon.
scene: 47   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM (REDRESS MESS)

quote: Alexander...
scene: 47   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM (REDRESS MESS)

quote: Or are you just going to send me    away again?
scene: 47   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM (REDRESS MESS)

quote: We are not playing in holosuites,    now. This is war. The Jem'Hadar    will cut you to pieces.
scene: 47   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM (REDRESS MESS)

quote: Then I will be dead. And you will    be happy. Now leave me alone.
scene: 47   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM (REDRESS MESS)

quote: Come in.
scene: 49   INT. KIRA'S QUARTERS - NIGHT

quote: What do you want?
scene: 49   INT. KIRA'S QUARTERS - NIGHT

quote: From Gul Dukat. For some reason    he thought you would enjoy having    me deliver it to you.
scene: 49   INT. KIRA'S QUARTERS - NIGHT

quote: What is it?
scene: 49   INT. KIRA'S QUARTERS - NIGHT

quote: A gift for the party tonight.
scene: 49   INT. KIRA'S QUARTERS - NIGHT

quote: What the hell am I doing?
scene: 49   INT. KIRA'S QUARTERS - NIGHT

quote: What a pleasant surprise. Come    in, major.
scene: 49A  INT. HABITAT RING CORRIDOR (FORMERLY SCENE 67)

quote: You don't like the dress?
scene: 49B  INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS (FORMERLY SCENE 68)

quote: The dress is fine. I don't like    you.
scene: 49B  INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS (FORMERLY SCENE 68)

quote: Major, that's just not true.    There's a bond between us.
scene: 49B  INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS (FORMERLY SCENE 68)

quote: Only in your mind. You're an    opportunistic, power-hungry    dictator, and I want nothing to do    with you.
scene: 49B  INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS (FORMERLY SCENE 68)

quote: Ziyal would be so disappointed to    hear you say that.
scene: 49B  INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS (FORMERLY SCENE 68)

quote: She'll get over it.
scene: 49B  INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS (FORMERLY SCENE 68)

quote: Nerys, why don't we sit down and    talk about it.
scene: 49B  INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS (FORMERLY SCENE 68)

quote: No, we won't.
scene: 49B  INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS (FORMERLY SCENE 68)

quote: Who was that?
scene: 49B  INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS (FORMERLY SCENE 68)

quote: A delivery.        A little something for you to wear    at the party tonight.
scene: 49B  INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS (FORMERLY SCENE 68)

quote: It's beautiful! You can be so    thoughtful.
scene: 49B  INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS (FORMERLY SCENE 68)

quote: I try.
scene: 49B  INT. DUKAT'S QUARTERS (FORMERLY SCENE 68)

quote: Fine blade. Well balanced. But    in the end, it is only as good as    the warrior who wields it.
scene: 50   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM - NIGHT

quote: I need more practice.
scene: 50   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Rest a moment. You look like you    can use it.        Tell me, Alexander Rozhenko. Why    are you on my ship?
scene: 50   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM - NIGHT

quote: To serve the Empire, general.
scene: 50   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM - NIGHT

quote: That is a slogan, not an answer.    Say what is in your heart.
scene: 50   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Do you ask every new crewman this    question?
scene: 50   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM - NIGHT

quote: I have no need to. I look in    their faces and I know why they're    here. They are Klingon warriors.    They have answered the call of    Kahless.
scene: 50   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM - NIGHT

quote: So have I.
scene: 50   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Lie to yourself if you must, but    not to me. You do not hear the    warriors' call. So I ask again,    why are you here?
scene: 50   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM - NIGHT

quote: I'd rather not say.
scene: 50   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM - NIGHT

quote: What?
scene: 50   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM - NIGHT

quote: It's a private matter.
scene: 50   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM - NIGHT

quote: You are as tight-lipped as your    father.
scene: 50   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM - NIGHT

quote: I am nothing like him.
scene: 50   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM - NIGHT

quote: You are both stubborn, tiresome    Qu'vatlh. The only difference    is... I need him -- but I don't    need you.
scene: 50   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM - NIGHT

quote: All I ask is a chance to prove    myself.
scene: 50   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM - NIGHT

quote: I just gave you one. And you    failed. Your father has requested    that you be transferred off this    ship.
scene: 50   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM - NIGHT

quote: He has no right!
scene: 50   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM - NIGHT

quote: He has every right -- both as your    superior officer and as your    father.        At twenty-three seventeen, you    will transport to the cargo    vessel Par'tok. Collect your    gear. Now.
scene: 50   INT. BIRD OF PREY - TRAINING ROOM - NIGHT

quote: You are fortunate that I am your    father. If you had challenged    anyone else in this manner you    would be dead right now.
scene: 52   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL - NIGHT

quote: If you want me off this ship    you're going to have to kill me.
scene: 52   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL - NIGHT

quote: Do not tempt me.
scene: 52   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL - NIGHT

quote: I do not want to hurt you,    Alexander. I want to help you.
scene: 52   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL - NIGHT

quote: By getting rid of me? All you've    ever done my whole life is send me    away.
scene: 52   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL - NIGHT

quote: I am a Klingon warrior. I lead a    warrior's life. That is not the    path for you -- you told me that    yourself. And I have come to    accept it.
scene: 52   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL - NIGHT

quote: How? By ignoring me? You call    yourself my father but you haven't    tried to see me or talk to me in    five years.
scene: 52   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL - NIGHT

quote: I wasn't the kind of son you    wanted so you pretended,that you    had no son.        You never accepted me. You    abandoned me.
scene: 52   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL - NIGHT

quote: Battle stations. Alert status    one.
scene: 52   INT. BIRD OF PREY - MESS HALL - NIGHT

quote: Shields at sixty percent.
scene: 54   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: And the Jem'Hadar?
scene: 54   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: Which one, sir?
scene: 54   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: The one shooting at us!
scene: 54   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: His aft shields are down to...    twenty-five, no twenty percent and    he's losing anti-protons from his    starboard nacelle.
scene: 54   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: Weapons, lock onto that nacelle.    Fire at will.
scene: 54   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: Target locked!
scene: 54   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: We've lost target lock. Switching    to manual.
scene: 54   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: Come to three-one-seven mark zero    four five. Weapons, can you hit    him?
scene: 54   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: Negative. He's out of range.
scene: 54   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: We've lost internal    communications.
scene: 54   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: Worf. Get that plasma leak under   control before we lose that entire   deck!
scene: 54   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: I can seal the leak.    (points over to the     smoking sensor console)    I'm of no use to you here.
scene: 54   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: I will go with him. It will take    at least two of us to secure the    injector before it explodes.
scene: 54   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: Go.
scene: 54   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: Worf, put us off the Jem'Hadar's    starboard quarter. Weapons,    continue to target his damaged    nacelle.
scene: 54   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: Maj-KKah!  Helm, on    my command drop impulse power to    one-third and come to course three-   five-five mark zero-nine-zero.    Weapons, be ready for him to pass    in front of us.
scene: 59   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (RESUME)

quote: Course laid in.
scene: 59   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (RESUME)

quote: Weapons standing by.
scene: 59   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (RESUME)

quote: Now!
scene: 59   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE (RESUME)

quote: Well done.
scene: 61   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: Permission to leave the bridge?
scene: 61   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: Go.        Stand down from alert status.    N'Garen, take the helm.
scene: 61   INT. BIRD OF PREY - BRIDGE

quote: Report.
scene: 62   INT. BIRD OF PREY - DECK FIVE - CORRIDOR

quote: We sealed the impulse injector,    commander.
scene: 62   INT. BIRD OF PREY - DECK FIVE - CORRIDOR

quote: Where is my son?
scene: 62   INT. BIRD OF PREY - DECK FIVE - CORRIDOR

quote: Trapped in that corridor, sir.    After we secured the injector, I    sent him in there to put away the    tools and somehow he tripped the    emergency lockdown. We are trying    to override it now.
scene: 62   INT. BIRD OF PREY - DECK FIVE - CORRIDOR

quote: You locked yourself in?
scene: 62   INT. BIRD OF PREY - DECK FIVE - CORRIDOR

quote: Yes, sir.
scene: 62   INT. BIRD OF PREY - DECK FIVE - CORRIDOR

quote: Come.
scene: 62   INT. BIRD OF PREY - DECK FIVE - CORRIDOR

quote: Nerys.
scene: 66A  INT. HABITAT RING CORRIDOR

quote: You didn't come to the party last    night.
scene: 66A  INT. HABITAT RING CORRIDOR

quote: I'm sorry. I couldn't.        And I think you know why.
scene: 66A  INT. HABITAT RING CORRIDOR

quote: Nerys, please don't ask me to    choose between you.
scene: 66A  INT. HABITAT RING CORRIDOR

quote: I'm not. There's no choice. He's    your father.
scene: 66A  INT. HABITAT RING CORRIDOR

quote: I cannot change the mistakes I    have made, but I promise you, from    this day forward, I will stand    with you.
scene: 69A  INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS

quote: We'll see if you mean that.
scene: 69A  INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS

quote: Yes. We shall.
scene: 69A  INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS

quote: What you are about to do entails    a grave obligation. Do not accept    it lightly.
scene: 69A  INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS

quote: I understand.        And I accept.
scene: 69A  INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS

quote: Good.        I will teach you what you need to    know to be a warrior...       ... and you will teach me what I    need to know to be a father.        Come.
scene: 69A  INT. BIRD OF PREY - WORF'S QUARTERS

quote: Martok degh, to-Duj degh, bat-LEH    degh, mat-LEH degh. (Badge of    Martok, badge of courage, badge of    honor, badge of loyalty.)
scene: 70   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM - A WOODEN CASE

quote: Martok degh.
scene: 70   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM - A WOODEN CASE

quote: Alexander, vih-nob dok-tog. (Give    him your dagger.)
scene: 70   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM - A WOODEN CASE

quote: Wachk ihw, wachk kkor-duh. (one    blood, one house.)
scene: 70   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM - A WOODEN CASE

quote: Wachk ihw, wachk kkor-duh
scene: 70   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM - A WOODEN CASE

quote: Wachk ihw, wachk kkor-duh.
scene: 70   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM - A WOODEN CASE

quote: Mat-LEH gih-Hegh! (I will be    faithful even beyond death.)
scene: 70   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM - A WOODEN CASE

quote: DAH!
scene: 70   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM - A WOODEN CASE

quote: Welcome to the House of Martok,    Alexander, Son of Worf.
scene: 70   INT. BIRD OF PREY - READY ROOM - A WOODEN CASE
